clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Two Different Toothpastes for Clinical Management of Extrinsic Stains.
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Two Different Toothpastes for the Clinical Management of Extrinsic Stains: Randomized Clinical Trial.

brief_summary.textblock:
The aim of the study is to assess the efficacy of Blanx Black Toothpaste and Mouthwash against extrinsic stains of teeth.
Patients who sign the informed consent will participate to the study.
At the baseline, the collection of Plaque Index, modified Lobene index and Bleeding Index will be performed, giving the instruction for a proper home oral hygiene. Professional supragingival and subgingival dental hygiene with piezoelectric will be performed. Then, patients will be randomly divided into two groups:
- Trial Group will use Blanx Black Toothpaste (2 minutes brushing) + Mouthwash (after brushing, at least for 30 seconds) twice a day for the all the study duration;
- Control Group will use Blanx Nordic Toothpaste (2 minutes brushing) twice a day.
Patients will be reevaluated after 7 days, after 1 month and after 3 months, collecting again the indices and improving home oral care.

detailed_description.textblock:
The aim of the study is to assess the efficacy of Blanx Black Toothpaste and Mouthwash against extrinsic stains of teeth.
For this purpose, patients addressing to the Dental Hygiene Unit that agree to participate to the study will be enrolled after signing the informed consent.
At the baseline, the collection of Plaque Index, modified Lobene index and Bleeding Index will be performed, giving the instruction for a proper home oral hygiene. Professional supragingival and subgingival dental hygiene with piezoelectric will be performed. Then, patients will be randomly divided into two groups:
- Trial Group will use Blanx Black Toothpaste (2 minutes brushing) + Mouthwash (after brushing, at least for 30 seconds) twice a day for the all the study duration;
- Control Group will use Blanx Nordic Toothpaste (2 minutes brushing) twice a day.
Patients will be reevaluated after 7 days, after 1 month and after 3 months. After the reinforcement of home oral hygiene, the above mentioned indices will be collected.

primary_outcome.description: Evaluation of the presence of plaque with a disclosing agent on the 4 surfaces of teeth on the total amount of dental surfaces multiplied per 100.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in MLI - Modified Lobene Index

primary_outcome.description: Site-specific assessment of the presence or absence of gum bleeding after the insertion of the periodontal probe for the detection of PPD, detected on 6 sites and recorded after 30 seconds from the insertion of the probe. Scoring criteria: 0: no bleeding 1: mild bleeding 2: severe bleeding The number of bleeding sites is divided per the total number of probed sites; the ratio is multiplied X 100.

arm_group.description: Use of Blanx Black Toothpaste + Mouthwash.

intervention.description: Use of Blanx Black Toothpaste twice a day per at least 2 minutes, followed by Blanx Black Mouthwash after brushing for at least 30 seconds.
Use of Blanx Nordic Toothpaste twice a day per at least 2 minutes

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age > 18 years
- Presence of extrinsic stains
- Patients with high compliance
Exclusion Criteria:
- Underage patients
- Patients suffering from neurological or psychiatric disorders
- Pregnant women
- Patients undergoing anticancer chemotherapy
- Patients with low compliance
